title: Central Park
description: A beautiful urban park featuring walking trails, picnic areas, and playgrounds.

title: City Museum
description: Explore local history, art, and interactive exhibits at the city museum.

title: Downtown Market
description: A bustling market with fresh produce, crafts, and local foods.

title: Riverside Walkway
description: Enjoy scenic views along the river, with bike paths and benches.

title: City Theater
description: Catch live performances, plays, and concerts at the historic theater.

title: Art Gallery
description: Local and international art exhibits in a modern gallery space.

title: Botanical Gardens
description: Discover native and exotic plants across beautifully landscaped gardens.

title: Aquarium
description: See marine life up close, from colorful fish to interactive touch tanks.
